anyOf.description:
@telus-uds/palette-koodo/v1.1.3 palette tokens 🖌️
For 'pill' designs with circular sides, which become rounded rectangles of radius 32 if forced to have height greater than 64 (for example, if user's accessibility settings increase text size)
anyOf.markdownDescription:
`@telus-uds/palette-koodo/v1.1.3` **palette** tokens 🖌️

For 'pill' designs with circular sides, which become rounded rectangles of radius 32 if forced to have height greater than 64 (for example, if user's accessibility settings increase text size)

anyOf.description:
@telus-uds/palette-koodo/v1.1.3 palette tokens 🖌️
Raise the element one level from the surface, such as sticky elements

@telus-uds/palette-koodo/v1.1.3 palette tokens 🖌️
Raise the element to the highest level from the surface, such as mega-nav

Raise the element to the highest level from the surface, such as mega-nav

anyOf.description:
@telus-uds/palette-koodo/v1.1.3 palette tokens 🖌️
Use inset shadow to drop the element below the surface for interactive elements such as UI meters, card call-outs, and ToggleSwitch
anyOf.markdownDescription:
`@telus-uds/palette-koodo/v1.1.3` **palette** tokens 🖌️

Use inset shadow to drop the element below the surface for interactive elements such as UI meters, card call-outs, and ToggleSwitch

anyOf.description:
@telus-uds/palette-koodo/v1.1.3 palette tokens 🖌️
Use raised shadow to raise the element for interactive elements within an inset interface such as the knob in the ToggleSwitch
anyOf.markdownDescription:
`@telus-uds/palette-koodo/v1.1.3` **palette** tokens 🖌️

Use raised shadow to raise the element for interactive elements within an inset interface such as the knob in the ToggleSwitch

anyOf.description:
@telus-uds/system-tokens/v0.7.36 system react-native tokens ⚙️
Any integer value. The spacing scale uses 0-11
anyOf.markdownDescription:
@telus-uds/system-tokens/v0.7.36 system react-native tokens ⚙️

Any integer value. The spacing scale uses `0-11`

💡 Only `0-11` are suggested, but **any positive integer** is valid.
See [themes](https://telus.github.io/universal-design-system/docs/themes) docs.
